snippet: Serena Williams reached her fourth final of the season by taking the last eight games to beat Andrea Petkovic, 7-5, 6-0, on Saturday.
abstract: Serena Williams reaches her fourth final of the season by taking the last eight games to beat Andrea Petkovic in the Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams reached her fourth final of the season by taking the last eight games to beat Andrea Petkovic, 7-5, 6-0, on Saturday.

headline.main: Serena Williams Gains Bank of the West Final
headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Gains Bank of the West Final
